sentences.en: Any place within the fault zone could have breakage.
sentences.cn: 断层带内的任何地方都会有破裂.

sentences.en: Breakage never happened to our deliveries before.
sentences.cn: 我方过去交货,从未出现过破损.

sentences.en: Brushing wet hair can cause stretching and breakage.
sentences.cn: 梳理湿头发会拉抻头发，造成损伤。

sentences.en: Check that your insurance policy covers breakages and damage when moving.
sentences.cn: 检查你的保险是否涵盖搬运中的破损和毁坏。

sentences.en: Every compartment had some minor breakage or malfunction to report.
sentences.cn: 每间舱房总有些小毛病或机件失灵的事故上报.

sentences.en: Fire, theft, damage of various kinds, like breakage.
sentences.cn: 火灾, 失窃, 各种损害, 比如漏水等.

sentences.en: Have you found the cause of the breakage?
sentences.cn: 你们找到了破损的原因 吗 ?

sentences.en: I suppose this breakage took place on route.
sentences.cn: 也许破损是发生在途中吧?

sentences.en: My product is particularly subject to breakage and heat damage.
sentences.cn: 我的物品容易破碎和受损.

sentences.en: Only when the stress reaches the " ultimate strength " does failure, i . e . , breakage , occur.
sentences.cn: 只有当应力达到极限强度时才会造成损坏.

sentences.en: Please let us know if there is any breakage or other complaints.
sentences.cn: 若有破损或其他不满,敬请告知.

sentences.en: The mechanism of thermal breakage trace of window glass was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了火灾中窗玻璃热炸裂痕迹的形成机理及其影响因素.

sentences.en: The risk of breakage is a particular average, is not it?
sentences.cn: 破损险是一种单独海损, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: There was a great deal of breakage in that shipment of glassware.
sentences.cn: 那批玻璃器皿损坏了很多.

sentences.en: We can cover the Risk of Breakage for you if you want.
sentences.cn: 如果你方想投保破碎险,我方可以代为办理.

sentences.en: We should also choose a catalyst that is resistant to attrition and breakage.
sentences.cn: 我们还应当选用耐磨和不易粉碎的催化剂.

words.tran_cn: 易碎的东西，易破的东西
折断；打碎；损坏（break的过去分词）
打破，弄破；中断；弄坏；削弱
破坏；[保险]破损；裂口；破损量

trans.tran_en: Breakage is the act of breaking something
